originalText.text:
The atmosphere, music (light house) ðŸŽµ , lightingðŸ’¡ , and top-notch service - this is what differentiates this place from many others. Its very cozy. Starting from Jose, who meets you at the entrance, ending with the manager who brings out the check - its flawless!
The food was good but I would add more options to the menu. My trout was a trout (I didnt expect much) and cooked well, big portion too. We also had salmon which was good. Charcuterie board actually surprised us with the good variety and combination. And the dessert- oh so good! The bread pudding- absolutely a must!

originalText.text:
Best new restaurant on the Upper West Side located inside the chic Hotel Belleclaire. The service food and ambiance were top notch. Enjoyed the vibe and trendy music. Highly recommend to anyone and is easy to get to right off Broadway.

An absolute must! Highly recommend the steak/ trout, purple Peruvian mash potatoes and truffle Mac and cheese.  They have an exquisite curated cocktail menu and my favorite was the hot tropic. One of the best cocktails Iâ€™ve ever had. Iâ€™d also recommend anything of the desert menu, absolutely mouth watering.

Cannot wait to return and HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

originalText.text: All I can say about Allure's food is "wow." This restaurant is a newer spot on the Upper West Side so I wasn't sure what to expect going in, but I've already made a reservation to return because the food is so immaculate. I ordered what I'll call "elevated basics," like the Chips and Dip appetizer (the garlic aioli was especially divine with the crispy house chips) plus the Silver Service NYC Dog with a soft pretzel bun. My Smoked Old Fashioned cocktail had hints of maple that paired beautifully with the smokiness (and there sure was smokiness...check out the photo I took!) and finally, my Rainbow Trout entree was the best trout I've ever tasted, bar none. The temptation to gatekeep Allure and therefore keep it a special secret was strong, but instead I'll probably see you there for more fancy hot dogs and cocktails.

originalText.text: I went to Allure on a girls night, and our experience was exceptional! The host, Apollo, greeted us with a warm welcome and made us feel VIP. The ambiance was chic, elegant and even a bit sexy! I had the Smokey Old Fashion which had an alluring presentation and was delicious. The burrata and cuddle fish were favorites, and the chef even made a special dish for our vegan friend. Our server gave us excellent recommendations and perfect table service, the owner also stopped by to say hi and make sure everything was exceptional. We had a fabulous time and will be back!

originalText.text: We recently hosted our daughter and future son-in-laws engagement party at Allure Restaurant & Lounge, and it was outstanding. The food was amazing as were the cocktails! The best part was the team that worked with us to make the night a success. From the ease of collaborating with the event planners, to the mixologists as well as the entire staff that worked the party, everyone went out of their way to provide incredible service which resulted in a perfectly curated event. The team also found us a great DJ! This new addition to City Nights Hospitality is a gem. I had no doubt that it would be a success as I have hosted events at their other locations. They always shine when it comes to their culinary offerings as well as the attention to detail. The lounge has great ambiance as well as a sexy vibe and was perfect for our group of 100. I highly recommend Allure for not only events, but for a night out. They excel in every way! Thanks Allure for making this special time so memorable.
